subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* [[木靴]] ([[목화]], ''mokhwa'') The [[courtesy]] [[footwear]] in the Eastern tradition, as worn by [[courtier]]s, somewhat similar to the [[moccasin]] made of [[deerskin]].
* [[洋靴]] ([[양화]], ''yanghwa'') Western [[shoe]]s, [[boot]]s
* [[長靴]] ([[장화]], ''janghwa'') [[boot]]s

[[Category:Hanja readings|화]]
